sentences.en: "You must come to Tinsley's graduation party." — "I'd be delighted."
sentences.cn: “你一定要来参加廷斯利的毕业聚会。”——“我很乐意。”

sentences.en: After graduation Neil returned to Ohio.
sentences.cn: 尼尔毕业以后回到了俄亥俄州。

sentences.en: At my brother's high school graduation the students recited a poem.
sentences.cn: 在我弟弟的高中毕业典礼上，学生们朗诵了一首诗。

sentences.en: Frolicsome students celebrated their graduation with parties and practical jokes.
sentences.cn: 爱玩闹的学生们举行聚会,制造各种恶作剧来庆祝毕业.

sentences.en: Graduation from university is an event in life.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业是人生中的大事.

sentences.en: He decided to specialize in entomology after graduation.
sentences.cn: 他决定毕业后专攻昆虫学.

sentences.en: He gave a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.cn: 他在毕业典礼上发表了动人的告别辞.

sentences.en: He purposed that he would marry after graduation.
His cheating on the final queered his chances of graduation.
sentences.cn: 他在大考中作弊影响了他的毕业.

sentences.en: His graduation will never take place if he doesn't get to work.
sentences.cn: 他要是不用功就永远毕不了业.

sentences.en: I have determined on [ upon ] going to the countryside after graduation.
sentences.cn: 我已决定毕业后到农村去.

sentences.en: On graduation (= after completing a first degree ) , Nancy became an art teacher.
sentences.cn: 南希毕业以后当了一名美术老师。

sentences.en: On graduation (= after completing a first degree ), Nancy became an art teacher.
sentences.cn: 南希毕业以后当了一名美术老师。

sentences.en: The letter arrived in congratulation of my graduation from the university.
sentences.cn: 我收到了大学毕业的贺信.

sentences.en: They asked what his plans were after graduation.
sentences.cn: 他们问他毕业之后有何打算。

sentences.en: They were married with all the trimmings, soon after graduation.
sentences.cn: 他们毕业后不久就大操大办地结婚了。

sentences.en: To be specific , the argument in your graduation thesis is logical.
sentences.cn: 具体地说, 你的毕业论文符合逻辑.

sentences.en: Vicky and Gary attended the graduation exercises at Columbia.
sentences.cn: 维基和加里参加了哥伦比亚大学的毕业典礼。

words.tran_cn: 累进的；分等级的；毕了业的；为毕业生设立的
年级；等级；成绩；级别；阶段
分阶段；定等级；坡度缓和
定等级；减缓坡度（grade的现在分词形式）
使毕业；毕业（graduate的过去分词）；使…升级

毕业；毕业典礼；[仪]刻度，[机]分度；分等级

trans.tran_en: the time when you complete a university degree course or your education at an American  high school
